{{actor | image = | name = Sarah McLeod | lifetime = [[18 July]] [[1971]] | played = [[Rose Cotton|Rosie Cotton]] | film = ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''
''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' | imdb= [https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0572867/ Profile] }} '''Sarah McLeod''' (b. [[18 July|July 18]], [[1971]]) is a New Zealand actress who played [[Rose Cotton]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film series]]. In June [[2007]], she and 14 other actors filed [https://us.imdb.com/news/ni0058227/ a lawsuit] against [[New Line Cinema]] over merchandising royalties.{{webcite|author=MrCere|articleurl=https://www.theonering.net/torwp/2007/06/01/23983-actors-join-to-sue-new-line-over-lotr-merchandising/|articlename=Actors join to sue New Line over LOTR merchandising|dated=1 June 2007|website=TORN|accessed=3 December 2024}} The action was settled out of court in October [[2008]].{{webcite|author=MrCere|articleurl=https://www.theonering.net/torwp/2008/10/08/30205-new-zealand-actors-settle-out-of-court-with-new-line-cinema/|articlename=New Zealand actors settle out of court with New Line|dated=8 October 2008|website=TORN|accessed=3 December 2024}} ==Quotes== {{quote|I was up at 5 am every morning getting my feet put on. You don't see my feet at all in the first film, but you may see them more in the third film. I had the most amazing wig, it was beautiful, and it was made from real hair.|Sarah McLeod, theonering.net}} == External links == * {{WP|Sarah McLeod}} {{References}} {{DEFAULTSORT:McLeod, Sarah}} [[Category:Actors and actresses]] [[Category:New Zealand people]] [[Category:People by name]] [[Category:The Lord of the Rings (film series) cast]] [[de:Sarah McLeod]] [[fi:Sarah McLeod]]
